Sample Diet Chart
-----------------------------
 --> Breakfast: 1 bowl of watermelon with a glass of water.
 --> Brunch: 1 cup of carrot and berries with 1 glass of water.
 --> Lunch: 1 bowl of lightly sautéed vegetables, 1 bowl of cooked brown rice with 2 glasses of water.
 -->Afternoon Snack: 1 pear and a glass of water.
 --> Evening Snack: 1 Guava and a glass of water.
 --> Dinner: Take a bowl of mixed vegetable soup and 2 glasses of water.
